definition: USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The solid state disk is called the electronic disk.
sentences.chinese: 固態盤又稱電子盤有着非常廣泛的應用前景。

sentences.english: This data reflects the current electronic disc prices below the spot price is the case in recent months.
sentences.chinese: 此數據反映當前電子盤近月價格出現低於現貨價情況。

sentences.english: The paper researches the structure of IDE and its features, discusses the design technology.
sentences.chinese: 該文研究了電子盤的結構和特點，描述了設計技術。
